page.title: 04YOUTH ACTIVITIES
page.content: Youth Activities in Bradwell. The under 16's in Bradwell have a wide range of activities. A playgroup for the pre-school children meets 3 times a week. School age children have {Shell Group}which is a type of youth club. Girls have{Guides, Brownies}and {Girls Brigade,}boys have{Cubs}and {Scouts.} On the sporting side{Bradwell {Rovers Soccer Team}runs{3}boys teams, also the{Bradwell Badminton Club}have junior coaching on Mondays and Thursdays. In the Summer we have a spectacular{fell race}which involves running 600 feet up Bradwell Edge and down again,down is the hard bit! There are prizes for the winners. This takes place in carnival week. Also in carnival week the majorettes march in the parades. This summer there is a {play scheme}for school age children at Hope Valley College.
